entities.name: lockhart
entities.description: Lockhart is mentioned as the one who claims to have prevented a series of attacks in Ouagadougou. He also has photographs on the walls nodding in agreement with him.

entities.name: dumbledore
entities.description: Dumbledore is mentioned as the one who tells Filch that Mrs Norris is not dead but Petrified.

entities.name: filch
entities.description: Filch is mentioned as the one who is shocked and tearful when he finds out that Mrs Norris is not dead.

entities.name: harry
entities.description: Harry is mentioned as the one who is being pointed at by Filch to ask about how Mrs Norris was Petrified.

entities.name: mrs norris
entities.description: Mrs Norris is a cat that has been Petrified and is stiff and frozen.

entities.name: ouagadougou
entities.description: Ouagadougou is mentioned as the location where Lockhart claims to have prevented a series of attacks.

relationships.description: Lockhart visited Ouagadougou and prevented a series of attacks.
Dumbledore told Filch that Mrs Norris was Petrified.
Filch accused Harry of knowing how Mrs Norris was Petrified.
